project_descr: This  PPG phase is intended to hold stakeholder consultations and carry out preliminary technical assessments on water supply sources and their vulnerability to climate change, aswell as the submission of a project document by November 2013.

outputs.output_descr: Solomon Islands Water Sector Adaptation Project (SIWSAP) - Project Preparation Grant (PPG)

project_title: solomon islands water sector adaptation project-siwsap
